pkgmetadata.longdescription: Example data for the mosaics package, which implements MOSAiCS, a statistical framework to analyze one-sample or two-sample ChIP- seq data // Data for the mosaics package, consisting of chromosome 21 ChIP and control sample data from a ChIP-seq experiment of STAT1 binding, with mappability, GC content, and sequence ambiguity scores of human genome HG18.
